column5: Anyone know how to check to see if your Outdoor Card is still valid? Can't seem to find mine and not sure what my next step should be...
I lost my wallet and had to replace mine. Call 1-800-387-7011 and they will help. Had to wait on hold for awhile but once I got someone they were very helpful.
The lodge where we stay sells licenses and she was able to look up my outdoors card on line
